reviewText: Three exceptional action thrillers.  All three in this package are well worth your time if you enjoy action movies.Swordfish: You have John Travolta as a rogue agent that takes hostages at a bank to make the government pay him millions in compensation with the assistance of Hugh Jackman and Halle Barry.  Lots of twists in this one making it hard to tell who the bad guys are and what they really have in mind.Point Break: Patrick Swayze and his ex presidents are robbing banks with Keenu Reeves in pursuit for the FBI.  Keenu joins them undercover and develops a friendship that will make it hard to take them down.Executive Decision: Steven Seagal and his team with the aid of Kurt Russell try to regain control of a commercial flight full of terrorist. Kurt actually an analyst, but he gets roped into onsite support that becomes much more than he bargained for.  Great support cast in this one.CA Luster
summary: Executive Decision / Point Break / Swordfish (Triple Feature) [Blu-ray]

reviewText: Point Break seems to be out of place in this collection from my personal point of view as I am not a surfing enthusiast,  the Bluray transfers ore good on the 3 separate discs, However if you are a surfer this would certainly be a recommendation

reviewText: I have been a skier, skydiver, surfer, fast car driver and more. All of these movies kept my attention and at least got a smile or two out of me. I had seen them all in the past before U purchased these but I figured that since they were decent films I would enjoy watching the again. Three movies for a low price is a great deal.
